TEXT_DICT.ALLOW_RELICS: Enable new relics added by this mod to spawn when playing other characters
TEXT_DICT.ALLOW_EPISODIC_EVENTS: Enable other characters to come across the Astray's scenario events
TEXT_DICT.ASTRAY_CURSOR_AS_GLOBAL: Use the Astray's exclusive cursor as global cursor unless the playing character has its own one
TEXT_DICT.ASTRAY_CURSOR_AS_GLOBAL_TOOLTIP: (Requires manual compatibility from other characters, no auto-detection)

TEXT: Guide a way for an Enlighten card in your deck.
No Enlighten cards in your deck.
Choose a card and re- [#FFD700]Enlighten[] it.
You can Upgrade another card in your deck thanks to Traveller's Kit.
Mana is required to play a #ySpell card.
